original: 淄博淄川人，魏晉時期著名數學家。曾為《九章算術》作注，又撰寫《海島算經》等書，影響後世算學發展深遠。
text: Born in Zichuan, Zibo, a famous mathematician in the Wei and Jin Dynasties. He once wrote notes for "Nine Chapters of Arithmetic", and wrote books such as "Island Mathematical Scripture", which has a profound influence on the development of arithmetic in later generations.
